message: [Official] IMD issues Red Alert for Chennai. Extremely heavy rainfall expected over the next 24 hours. #ChennaiRains
[Official] All residents in low-lying areas are advised to move to higher ground. #ChennaiFloods #Alert
[Official] TNSDMA advises residents in coastal areas like Santhome and Besant Nagar to prepare for evacuation. #ChennaiFloods #Alert
[Official] Chennai Airport operations are temporarily suspended due to runway flooding. #ChennaiFloods
